product_metadata.product_name: Bajaj Life Magnum Fortune Plus III
product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Savings Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal allowed during the first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: Magnum Fortune Plus III is a ULIP savings plan designed to help policyholders achieve life goals with market-linked investments, life cover throughout the policy term, loyalty additions, maturity boosters and return of mortality charges.
key_highlights: Life cover protection throughout policy term
Wide range of equity, debt, and index funds
Loyalty additions from 10th policy year onwards
Maturity Booster for AutoPay users and existing customers
Return of Mortality Charges (ROMC) at maturity
Partial withdrawals allowed after 5 policy years
Settlement option for death and maturity benefit payouts (max 5 years)
Choice of multiple premium bands (Prime, Prestige, Priority)

plan_variants.variant_name: Single ULIP Variant with Premium Bands

core_benefits.details: On maturity, Fund Value including Top-up Fund Value is payable. Option available for lump sum or structured payout via Settlement Option (max 5 years).
Higher of Prevailing Sum Assured or Regular Premium Fund Value, plus higher of Top-up Sum Assured or Top-up Fund Value.
core_benefits.guarantee: Minimum Guaranteed Benefit = 105% of total premiums paid including top-ups.

core_benefits.start: End of 10th policy year onwards (every year till maturity)

core_benefits.details: Additional maturity value as % of average Regular Premium Fund Value of last 3 years.
Extra benefit at maturity if any family member is an existing Bajaj Life customer.
Total mortality charges deducted throughout policy term are added back at maturity, provided policy is in-force and premiums paid.

sum_assured_rules.maximum: Subject to Board Approved Underwriting Policy

partial_withdrawal.post_withdrawal_balance: Fund Value must remain ≥ 2× Annualized Premium

charges_structure.policy_administration_charge: 2.1% p.a. of annualized premium OR ₹500/month cap
charges_structure.mortality_charge: Deducted monthly, guaranteed through policy term

riders.rider_name: Linked New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

compliance_guardrails.ulip_risk_warning: ULIPs are subject to capital market risks. NAV may go up or down.
compliance_guardrails.lock_in_period: 5 years mandatory lock-in as per IRDAI regulations.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.
compliance_guardrails.suicide_exclusion: If suicide within 12 months, nominee receives Fund Value as on death intimation.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious calls and fictitious offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to prevailing Income Tax laws.

retrieval_chunks.text: Loyalty additions start from year 10 and add 0.5%–0.7% of average fund value each year till maturity.
Maturity Booster rewards AutoPay users and existing customers with up to 1% extra fund value at maturity.
ROMC adds back total mortality charges deducted across policy term at maturity if policy is in-force.
Partial withdrawals are allowed after 5 years, minimum ₹5,000, maximum 50% of fund value.
Premium allocation charges depend on premium band: Prime 4%, Prestige 3%, Priority 2%. Top-ups charged 2%.
